item.description:
Hola Amigos:

Yo hablo en español, tu hablas en español, nosotros hablamos en español….Join us for some Conversational Spanish and mingling around as we celebrate the coming Christmas and New Year 2010!

We are looking forward to meeting you all . All people of different levels are very welcome. Take advantage of the opportunity to meet cool new people, and put your Spanish into practice!

Come ready to rotate and talk to as many people as you can. We are all friendly and eager to get to know you. This is a very informal gathering. It will provide all of us with the opportunity to practice speaking Spanish in a real setting and get somewhat more acquainted to the Latino culture. Remember our objective is having fun while we are speaking Spanish

This event will be from 6:00p.m to 8:00pm but you are free to stay and hang out with people you meet afterward.

Bring your questions about grammar or about Hispanic culture. I will be glad to answer any questions you may have !!! Tu amigo/a Hispano/a sientete con toda confianza de hablar de tu cultura, tus cotumbres y tu pais.

This is an event sponsored by SpanishBlackBelt. No Meetup fee will be charged. Please support this meeting venue by ordering some appetizers and/or drinks so that we can continue meeting here.



Please RSVP if you are planning on coming. Hasta muy pronto !!!

If instead, or in addition, you want to attend one of our regular Spanish classes, please click here to access all Small Group sessions currently being offered by Spanish Black Belt.
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup badge and a big smile!
item.name: Conversational Spanish, Tapas and Wine (All levels)
